document_data.name: Watchware, 30' Radius
document_data.mainbody: '''''Watchware, 30' radius''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[evocation]] [[spell]] that was an improvement over the basic ''[[watchware]]'' spell.
document_data.Effects: When placed upon a fixed location, the magic of this spell extended for {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} in every direction, alerting the caster to anything entering that area.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a spider web, a small [[bell]] made from [[brass]] or [[silver]], and a pinch of powdered glass to cast.
